ygData.subject: Re: The Legacy of Hell Beast
ygData.msgSnippet: Farewell, commander Hell Beast. You will be missed. We had our differences, and arguments, but I have enjoyed fighting alongside and against you. Farewell, and

Farewell, commander Hell Beast. You will be missed. We had our differences, 
and arguments, but I have enjoyed fighting alongside and against you.

Farewell, and good luck.

(By the way, you ruined half my plans, you bastard!)
